alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Gibson; Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 11:03PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Weakley, northeastern Dyer, northwestern Gibson and eastern Obion Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1103 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clayton to near Ridgely to near Hayti Heights. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Martin, Union City, Fulton, Newbern, South Fulton, Dyer, Troy, Kenton, Rutherford, Obion, Bradleytown, Trimble, Rives, Yorkville, Lapata, Locust Grove, Jenkinsville, Shaffner and Maxey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
